articles.author: Selina Wang, Nectar Gan
articles.title: As crematoriums fill up, China shifts how it counts Covid deaths - CNN
articles.description: The prospect of a rising death toll, projected by some studies to be as high as one million, has become a thorny issue for a government that staked its legitimacy on "saving lives."
articles.content: For much of the pandemic, images of overflowing hospitals and busy funeral homes from the United States have featured heavily on Chinas state-controlled television, where the deaths of over a million… [+6571 chars]

articles.author: Kelsey Ables
articles.title: Scientists have a theory on covid loss of smell: Damage to nasal cells - The Washington Post
articles.description: While some have linked smell loss to the nervous system, a study suggests part of the problem could be in the nose — meaning there is potential for topical treatments.
articles.content:

articles.author: Cassidy Morrison Senior
articles.title: Hospitals should stop mass testing for Covid, says influential panel of infectious disease experts - Daily Mail
articles.description: An influential panel of infectious disease experts recommended that hospitals stop testing all new admissions for Covid, a move they argue is coming at too high a cost for patients and providers.
